page.title: 03Growth of Threemilestone.
page.content: {Threemilestone}started off as fields, then some houses were built. A small school was built which had only two classrooms and was called{Chyvealah.} As the village grew the school was too small so it was knocked down and{ {Threemilestone C.P School}was built. Threemilestone School has just ten class rooms and a{Library}and a{ {Resources room.}With the money from the fete we are going to build two small{Adventure Playgrounds.}Wimpy has just built about 200 houses and they are planning to build 500 more. That will mean that the school will be too small. Threemilestone has just built a new shop by the{Mini Market}but we do not know what it is going to be used for.
